name: ABC
text: A gun rights advocate known for defying Colorado's lockdown orders at her open-carry restaurant won a primary over a GOP congressman endorsed by Pres. Trump. https://t.co/9cDotvQuMJ

name: ABC
text: The Chinese government has deployed a mass sterilization campaign against Muslim ethnic minorities in the country's western provinces, according to a new report, which argues the tactics could amount to genocide. https://t.co/UQRtNkCAaK

name: ABC
text: The first woman and first person of color to lead the prestigious Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania says she wants young people to see her history-making role as an example to "always bet on yourself." https://t.co/F99ocYrl4P
